title: DDG Drosselmeyer Infuser Stainless Steel Tea Strainer and Spoon 2-in-1 Elegant Swedish Design Gold, 17 x 9 x 4 cm,TIBP01G
features: elegant and timeless design from sweden.
easy to use, no more stains.
clean solution easy to fill and easy to clean.
description: Tea is the world's most popular drink. Brewing a tea should therefore not be an annoying job. The idea in the design of the Drosselmeyer Tea Infuser was to create a product that is as easy to clean as it is to fill. The tea infuser works with all types of tea available. The coarse, as well as the very fine-leaved tea varieties, which usually quickly find a way through the filter into the tea water, are no problem for this design. When you have prepared your delicious tea with the tea infuser, you can simply place it on the table. No mess.
